thread.title: Jimmy Kimmel Calls Meryl Streep ‘Overrated’, Pokes Fun At Trump In His Savage Oscars' Speech! - Indiatimes.com
thread.title_full: Jimmy Kimmel Calls Meryl Streep ‘Overrated’, Pokes Fun At Trump In His Savage Oscars' Speech! - Indiatimes.com

title: Jimmy Kimmel Calls Meryl Streep ‘Overrated’, Pokes Fun At Trump In His Savage Oscars' Speech! - Indiatimes.com
text:
February 27, 2017 277 SHARES It’s no surprise that this year’s Oscars will be riding high on Politics(Read Trump). It kicked off with Host Jimmy Kimmel’s opening monologue taking a dig at everything and anything. From calling Mel Gibson a braveheart, Meryl Streep an overrated actress to fat-shaming Matt Damon, he did it all. In fact, he even went on to address the Pink Elephant in the room. Oops, we mean 'orange'! 
ABC On a very serious note, he said,” if everyone watching right now took a moment to reach out to one person you disagree with and have a positive, considerate conversation ... we could really make America great again." Jimmy Kimmel: "I want to say thank you to President Trump ... last year it seemed like the #Oscars were racist." pic.twitter.com/YeLsScJZv0 — Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 27, 2017 
However, not everything that he said was loaded. There were many light moments, especially when he addressed his love-hate relationship with Matt Damon. Kimmel went on to say he wanted to “bury the hatchet with someone I’ve had issues with”: his longtime nemesis, Matt Damon. But he wasted no time in throwing some insults in Damon’s way. He said,“When I first met Matt, I was the fat one” .
